message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm asking for $100 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your offer, but I need to cover my costs. I'm willing to come down to $90 for this product. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go to $85?
